name: myMediaList
description: #### Back-end do projeto feito com Nodejs, utilizando [Koajs](https://koajs.com/), [Postgres](https://www.postgresql.org/), [Knex](http://knexjs.org/#Installation-node) e testes com [Jest](https://jestjs.io/pt-BR/) e [Supertest](https://github.com/visionmedia/supertest). Fluxo de dados explicado [aqui](https://whimsical.com/6DcaGVNzinjE8fXvE42AUv).
